import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react/redux' import useStyles from './styles' import { Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardMedia, Button, Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import ThumbUpAltIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ThumbUpAlt' import DeletIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete' import MoreHorizIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MoreHoriz' import moment from 'moment' const Post = ({ post, setCurrentId }) => { // eslint-disable-next-line const classes = useStyles() return (
{post.creator} {moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()}
{post.tags.map((tag) => `#${tag} `)}
{post.title} {post.message} ) } export default Post
